enhanced_by.reason: The sentences method relies on the sentence method to generate individual sentences, indicating a strong state dependency.
The sentences method indirectly relies on the words method through the sentence method, suggesting a need to ensure word generation is properly tested.
Both sentences and paragraph methods generate text collections, making assertions on paragraph output useful for validating sentences.
The fixedString method generates a string of fixed length, which can be used to validate the length of sentences generated by the sentences method.
